node.name: Combo Fish Aquarium MAKE: JAINSONS PET PRODUCTS
node.description: With double arc shape, non-brittle plastic body and capacity of 15 litre, this aquarium completes with all technicality needed to made good habitat for more than 100 types of fish. Built-in equipmentâ€™s for filter water and lightning, artificial plant to create natural sea life atmosphere inside home. (SIZE: 335x280x190mm / WEIGHT: 2 Kg)
node.content: Major problem with the fish aquarium comes at time of water replacement, but with this 1 feet model by Indian manufacturer while using its bottom drainage duct and water supply at top, it is quiet handy to replace the whole volume of water at time to time / 3 watt filter pump is also placed inside the aquarium so that air can be pumped inside 24 by 7 / As per Aqua pet advisers, for home  "Mollies" fish is mostly favoured in India which comes in different colours and price range from 20 to 100 rupee / Small LED lamp inside which has switch system so that light can be turned off at time of day / Non-brittle plastic body can hold the other accessories of aquarium like gravels and aquatic plants to create a partial feel of ocean / Aquarium is subjected to 3 day test before dispatch still if leakage is found than replacement is also given and environment friendly 4mm glass never get blurred in entire life.
node.alt: JAINSONS PET PRODUCTS Fish Aquarium Combo Tank-15 Ltr Colour May Vary

node.name: Minjiang Fish Aquarium MAKE: JAINSONS PET
node.description: Intelligent operation like auto cut filtration and pump, 6 watt LED lighting system with multiple colours projection. With large filter tank it can habitat up to 20 fishes and poly acrylic glass prevents no temperature exchange. Perfect showcase product for small offices and clinics. (SIZE: 425x380x225mm / WEIGHT: 8 Kg)
node.content: Filter that can detect the chemical composition of water and separate them on hourly basis so that water remain breed able habitat for fishes / Auto cut mechanism is set for pump so that concentration of dissolved oxygen can be maintained / 6mm Poly acrylic glass is unbreakable from the drop of 3 feet but off course  without water, and also bacteria repellent plastic that do not allow algae to make its home / Can place as showcase item at living room because of multi colour display / Size is large enough for breeding the fishes and recommended by manufacturer to make it as a testing aquarium by aquatic vendor.
node.alt: Jainsons Pet Products Minjiang Fish Aquarium Tank HR3-380 Capacity-24L Rosewood

node.name: Betta Aquarium Kit MAKE: MARINA MODEL: 13354
node.description: Small and compact design for "Betta" fish which has adult size of 60mm. Unique concept for dynamic fish lamp with supporting arrangement to place small LED bulb. Package include colourful  gravel, Nutrafin betta fish food and Nutrafin betta plus conditioner for treatment of water. (SIZE: 155x155x145mm / WEIGHT: 700 grams)
node.content: Quiet small as per reviews from users but if subjected to real purpose of design than it is the most attractive aquarium one can get within piggy bank range / Arrangement for small electric bulb make it glow and fish swimming inside presented like a dynamic "Disco Ball" / It is recommended by manufacturer to place only "Betta" fish of average size length 25mm or 1 inch so that within small volume 2-3 numbers of same can be homed / Small aquarium is easy to maintain and even fits in narrow spaces, also in addition Nutrafin conditioner is provided to improve the water quality and for dropping the bad smell if cleaning time cycle is 1 week / Four edges are made of 4mm transparent gorilla glass and tested with water leakage for more than 3 days before dispatch / Expert suggest that "Betta" fish favours the warm water(25-30 degree Celsius) therefore at time of winter please make sure to maintain the water temperature while wrapping it with blanket at time by time.

node.name: Combo Fish Aquarium MAKE: DESPACITO MODEL: MJ-368
node.description: Extra clear edges made with acrylic glass, chemical resistive plastic and 22 litres of volume to raise "Betta", "guppies", "Angel" fish together. Multi-colour lightning with silent mode filtration makes it comfortable to put inside the bedroom, also enabled with pump and filter sponge. (SIZE: 380x360x220mm / WEIGHT: 7 Kg)
node.content: Most common and advisable tank size which can fit the common aquarium fish species available in Indian market / Advance filtration process that can also balance the pH of water so that fresh water fish remain healthy / 6mm Acrylic glass on edges which has never fading property and breakage protection from the 3 feet fall but without holding water / 3 colour led lightning system to change the appearance time by time and high efficiency filtration at rate of 400 litres per hour which works automatically / Zero noise performance makes it preferable to setup at bedroom / Chemical resistive plastic at bottom and three layers of top cover to prevent minimum temperature exchange from atmosphere.
node.alt: Despacito Aquarium Fish Tank Combo with Led Lighting and Fliter Pump Aquarium Starter Kits Perfect for Small Fishes Size 36x22x38cm 22 Litre
